entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @WhiteHouse President Trump's prevailing the crisis of coronavirus with a delicate and active aspect of visiting and encouraging workers in person. President Trump and workers in the field are united to fight the national crisis. President Trump's strong leadership can overcome any obstacles
